message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with texture modelling and synthesis, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of Markov-Gibbs random fields (MGRF) and the learning of high-order interactions suggest that the paper may also belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the use of local binary patterns, which are commonly used in image processing and computer graphics (cs.GR). Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed method on texture synthesis and inpainting tasks, which are common in multimedia (cs.MM).
